title: Soraka and Warwick
body:
It is kind of sad that soraka has been gutted out.

It would be great if riot lore team made a story or connection for human warwick and soraka. It will make an incredible encounter between soraka and wolf warwick.

replies.body:
Here's my thing.

Nothing about Soraka's lore is contradicted because nothing in her lore indicates the man called Warwick is the champion Warwick.

Just another dude called Warwick in the lore.

An easy temporary band aid for the problem of "Yeah but it's obviously Warwick" is to rename the guy in her lore. Call him Steve or Bob and all of a sudden she's fine for the time being.
We will be updating Soraka's lore (At least her short bio) in the future. Most likely sooner than later.

Nothing guaranteed; they probably just wanted to be sure Soraka's lore was fine going forward. Little indication of a large scale Ionia event just from this.

In fact, Ionia's probably one of the least likely nations to get all of its champions covered in one fell swoop.

> In fact, Ionia's probably one of the least likely nations to get all of its champions covered in one fell swoop.

That is an unfortunate certainty, with 13 highly associated champions(exulded jhin and Shen cause they are fairly complete) and the fact that at most 8 champions get a bio and story during region events, many champions will be excluded when Ionia comes.
They'd probably wanna do it in waves, such as tackling the ninjas as a whole, potentially with an Akali VGU.

Yeah I know, was just pointing out that a bandaid could be used here. I share the same sentiment as the rest of you, just wanted to point it out.
